ModulePrefs.title: PDF Wrapper
ModulePrefs.description: A gadget to embed/include a PDF in your page. More info: http://sites.google.com/site/mori79/html-gadgets/how-tos/pdf-wrapper
ModulePrefs.author: Mori
ModulePrefs.author_aboutme: An English teacher, a Google Sites Guru
ModulePrefs.author_quote: Follow your heart wherever it takes you.

Module.Content: <style type="text/css"> body {background:transparent;} </style> <embed type="application/pdf" src="__UP_url__" width="100%" height="100%"></embed>
